vooga.towerdefense.util

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Point2D
      • java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double
        • vooga.towerdefense.util.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class Location
extends Point2D.Double
    This class represents a Location (in pixels) on the screen and adds some utility functions to the Point2D class. Note, this might be overkill, it was just annoying that Point2D did not implement translate :(
    Author:
    Robert C. Duvall
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
